chunk:
Erno Laszlo Phormula 3-10 Eye Intensive

Brand: Erno Laszlo

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Water (Aqua/eau), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-hexanediol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Propanediol, Trehalose, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp Copolymer, Dipentaerythrityl Hexacaprylate/hexacaprate, Canola Oil, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/sodium Acryloy

ylate/sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Squalane, Carbomer, Caprylyl Glycol, Malus Domestica Fruit Extract, Zingiber Officinale Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil, Crataegus Monogina Flower Extract, Jasminum Sambac (Jasmine) Flower Ext

(Jasmine) Flower Extract, Sorbitan Isostearate, Niacinamide, Citric Acid, Capsicum Annuum Extract, Tocopherol, Opuntia Tuna Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
